## BEAUTY & SKINCARE

### ðŸ”¥ Gourmand Fragrances Dominate Gen Z Beauty Routines
Sweet, food-inspired scents are surging among Gen Z consumers, with fragrances evoking sugar cookies, strawberry shortcake, and cookies & cream trending across TikTok and Instagram. Unlike previous generations' preference for floral or fresh scents, younger consumers are embracing edible-smelling body sprays, perfumes, and skincare.

**Source:** Reddit  
**Type:** Viral Moment  
**Confidence:** 85% | **Relevance:** 8/10  
**Trending Hashtags:** #GourmandFragrance #GenZBeauty #SweetScents  
**Key Brands:** Sol de Janeiro, Ariana Grande Fragrance, Bath & Body Works, Kayali

---

## FASHION & APPAREL

### ðŸ”¥ EU Ban on Destroying Unsold Apparel Shakes Fashion Industry
New EU regulations prohibit the destruction of unsold clothing, accessories, and footwear. This landmark sustainability measure is forcing brands to rethink inventory management and accelerating the shift to circular fashion models. Major retailers are implementing AI-powered demand forecasting and exploring resale partnerships.

**Source:** Web (EU Environmental Policy)  
**Type:** Viral Moment  
**Confidence:** 95% | **Relevance:** 9/10  
**Trending Hashtags:** #SustainableFashion #CircularFashion #EUGreenDeal  
**Key Brands:** Zara, H&M, Uniqlo, Patagonia
